TopicTitle: [WIP]Clamber All The Things (Very Short Story With Video Clips)

Articles.Content:
**Chapter One**

Tasked with fixing the light at the olde airport, Bill discovers that he is able to suspend in thin air.

![8OgkY82.gif](http://i.imgur.com/8OgkY82.gif)

Bill also discovered that he can also levitate at the top of the flag pole.

![VZ7ybLd.png](http://i.imgur.com/VZ7ybLd.png)

Now the R&D team wants to know the secret.

The team assembles and the experimental testing begins. Samples, swabs, other samples and a variety of hardware are used to try to understand and determine the cause of this phenomena.

Later back at the astronaut complex.

Bill: "That was way too much testing. i think they over probed me and now my left eye has gone straight."

Bob: "The effects are only temporary."

Bob questions Bill on how he is able to levitate.

Bill: "Guys I think it all started when I was young. While in the Space Cadets I visited the Desert Temple.

Valentina: "So, what happened when you visited the Dessert Temple?"

Bob: "Did you find some hidden treasure?"

Jebediah: "Where you hit by something?"

Bill: "No I just clambered to the top of a ziggurat"

Valentina, Bob, Jebediah all exclaim: "WHAT?!?"

Bob: "You are not supposed to be playing on those. Those are ancient and should be respected."

Jebediah: "Bob.

Bob: "Yeah Jeb."

Jebediah: "Stop being a killjoy."

Bill, Jebediah, Valentina and Bob get ready to go on a pilgrimage to the dessert.

***These waters are not for the uninitiated.***

***Spoilers be here.***

***Approach no further.*** 

***Ye have been warned.***

**Chapter Two**

At the Dessert Temple complex.

Bill: "Here is the ziggurat I climbed."

Jebediah: "Want to try again to get to the top?"

Bill: "I could. This suit I am wearing is not too cumbersome."

Bill approaches the small ziggurat.

[Bill Climbs The Ancient Small Ziggurat](https://vimeo.com/133904741)

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/133904741" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" title="Bill Climbs Small Ziggurat" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Valentina: "Did you guys see that motion over by the statue?"

The team gathers and inspects the statue.

Bill: "There is something i can feel that I cannot see."

Bob: "Bill I cannot feel anything here."

Bill steps up and is suspended.

Jebediah: "Bill is this how you did that levitation trick on top the flagpole?"

Bill: "Hey Jebediah! Watch me pull a rabbit out of my hat."

Jebediah: "But..."

Bill: "See. Nothing up my sleeve"

Jebediah: "?!?"

Bill: "Presto"

[Clamber Statue](https://vimeo.com/133707322)

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/133707322" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" title="ClamberAmour II" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Bob attempts to climb the statue and fails.

Bob: "Maybe the top of the large ziggurat holds the answer."

Valentina: "I want to give that a try. I am very active and would love to see the view from on top of there.

Valentina approaches the base of the large ziggurat 

She starts to climb and just as Bob cannot acquire stable footing and slides as if the stones were covered in KD-42 lubricant.

Bob tries too but is more successful in falling.

Jebediah approaches Bill.

Jebediah: "Bill what do you think

Bill: "While I was on top of the statue the medium ziggurat around back flickered a bright light."

Bob: "Valentina would you want to go around and check that out?"

Valentina: "Just try and stop me."

Valentina goes around to the medium ziggurat.

There is a partial partition that is in in front of the medium ziggurat.

There is an inscription on the the wall and Valentina attempts to read it.

"THE CORNER KEY"

Valentina Climbs Medium Ziggurat

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/134465689" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" title="Valentina Climbs Medium Ziggurat" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The team gather and Valentina tells them about the inscription she saw and describes the sensation she felt while climbing the third step.

Valentina: "When at the middle of the ziggurat I started to feel lighter, almost as if I were on Minmus."

The team packs up and heads back to KSC and is questioned extensively by the R&D team.

**Chapter Three**

Back home at the Kerbal Space Centre.

Bill was asked if he could reach the top of the round fuel tank at the launchpad. Even though ladders were installed the top of these tanks are somehow inaccessible.

[Clamber Boost](https://vimeo.com/133250826)

Bill is persistent and learns some new tricks.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/133250826" width="960" height="720" frameborder="0" title="ClamberAmour" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
